paragraphs.content: Psalm 25
paragraphs.contentHtml: Psalm 25

paragraphs.content: A Psalm of David.
paragraphs.contentHtml: A Psalm of David.

paragraphs.content: Unto thee, O LORD, do I lift up my soul.
paragraphs.contentHtml: Unto thee, O Lord, do I lift up my soul.

paragraphs.content: O my God, I trust in thee: let me not be ashamed, let not mine enemies triumph over me.
paragraphs.contentHtml: O my God, I trust in thee: let me not be ashamed, let not mine enemies triumph over me.

paragraphs.content: Yea, let none that wait on thee be ashamed: let them be ashamed which transgress without cause.
paragraphs.contentHtml: Yea, let none that wait on thee be ashamed: let them be ashamed which transgress without cause.

paragraphs.content: Shew me thy ways, O LORD; teach me thy paths.
paragraphs.contentHtml: Shew me thy ways, O Lord; teach me thy paths.

paragraphs.content: Lead me in thy truth, and teach me: for thou art the God of my salvation; on thee do I wait all the day.
paragraphs.contentHtml: Lead me in thy truth, and teach me: for thou art the God of my salvation; on thee do I wait all the day.

paragraphs.content: Remember, O LORD, thy tender mercies and thy lovingkindnesses; for they have been ever of old.
paragraphs.contentHtml: Remember, O Lord, thy tender mercies and thy lovingkindnesses; for they have been ever of old.

paragraphs.content: Remember not the sins of my youth, nor my transgressions: according to thy mercy remember thou me for thy goodness’ sake, O LORD.
paragraphs.contentHtml: Remember not the sins of my youth, nor my transgressions: according to thy mercy remember thou me for thy goodness’ sake, O Lord.

paragraphs.content: Good and upright is the LORD: therefore will he teach sinners in the way.
paragraphs.contentHtml: Good and upright is the Lord: therefore will he teach sinners in the way.

paragraphs.content: The meek will he guide in judgment: and the meek will he teach his way.
paragraphs.contentHtml: The meek will he guide in judgment: and the meek will he teach his way.

paragraphs.content: All the paths of the LORD are mercy and truth unto such as keep his covenant and his testimonies.
paragraphs.contentHtml: All the paths of the Lord are mercy and truth unto such as keep his covenant and his testimonies.

paragraphs.content: For thy name’s sake, O LORD, pardon mine iniquity; for it is great.
paragraphs.contentHtml: For thy name’s sake, O Lord, pardon mine iniquity; for it is great.

paragraphs.content: What man is he that feareth the LORD? him shall he teach in the way that he shall choose.
paragraphs.contentHtml: What man is he that feareth the Lord? him shall he teach in the way that he shall choose.

paragraphs.content: His soul shall dwell at ease; and his seed shall inherit the earth.
paragraphs.contentHtml: His soul shall dwell at ease; and his seed shall inherit the earth.

paragraphs.content: The secret of the LORD is with them that fear him; and he will shew them his covenant.
paragraphs.contentHtml: The secret of the Lord is with them that fear him; and he will shew them his covenant.

paragraphs.content: Mine eyes are ever toward the LORD; for he shall pluck my feet out of the net.
paragraphs.contentHtml: Mine eyes are ever toward the Lord; for he shall pluck my feet out of the net.

paragraphs.content: Turn thee unto me, and have mercy upon me; for I am desolate and afflicted.
paragraphs.contentHtml: Turn thee unto me, and have mercy upon me; for I am desolate and afflicted.

paragraphs.content: The troubles of my heart are enlarged: O bring thou me out of my distresses.
paragraphs.contentHtml: The troubles of my heart are enlarged: O bring thou me out of my distresses.

paragraphs.content: Look upon mine affliction and my pain; and forgive all my sins.
paragraphs.contentHtml: Look upon mine affliction and my pain; and forgive all my sins.

paragraphs.content: Consider mine enemies; for they are many; and they hate me with cruel hatred.
paragraphs.contentHtml: Consider mine enemies; for they are many; and they hate me with cruel hatred.

paragraphs.content: O keep my soul, and deliver me: let me not be ashamed; for I put my trust in thee.
paragraphs.contentHtml: O keep my soul, and deliver me: let me not be ashamed; for I put my trust in thee.

paragraphs.content: Let integrity and uprightness preserve me; for I wait on thee.
paragraphs.contentHtml: Let integrity and uprightness preserve me; for I wait on thee.

paragraphs.content: Redeem Israel, O God, out of all his troubles.
paragraphs.contentHtml: Redeem Israel, O God, out of all his troubles.
